name: AP_CLAIM_INFO_SVC_POINTDX
description: Identifies the associated diagnosis code based on the first entry of the Diagnosis Pointer field that is used for medical EAPG assignment.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PT_DX_CODE
columns.description: Identifies the associated diagnosis code based on the first entry of the Diagnosis Pointer field that is used for medical EAPG assignment.
